title: Teacher Orchestration Load Management Strategies in Synchronous Hybrid Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive training course for corporate managers/leaders to enhance mathematical problem-solving skills. Exploring workload management strategies for effective instructional delivery in synchronous hybrid environments

learning_goals: Three or more cognitive, emotional, and physical loads occurring in synchronous hybrid environments can be identified and explained
Analyzing the impact of learner characteristics, technological environments, and instructional design elements on teacher orchestration load to develop response strategies
Creating hybrid class operation guidelines for effectively managing large-scale learners in BYOD environments

resources: Interactive Tools (Digital Whiteboard, Real-Time Polling System)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
